DOC.detailed_description: Objective The main objective study determine whether individual and/or group occupational therapy lead change generalize self-efficacy psychological well-being , identify type therapy best effect population old adult . In addition , investigator aim determine whether relationship different domains psychological well-being sense general self-efficacy . Design The research draw randomize experimental intervention study pre-post design . It compare two group : one receive individual therapy , group therapy . Setting The intervention conduct two state-assisted residential care center older adult Málaga ( Spain ) . Each participant first interview gather sociodemographic data ( age , gender , education level ) well verify score cognitive level require skill capability sufficient participate study . During interview , aim length intervention explain invitation participate give . All participant give inform consent . The care center Ethics Committee University Málaga authorize study . The cognitive emotional screening conduct intervention . In care center participant randomly assign two treatment group . Subjects From initial sample 112 resident , final sample 74 , divide two group 37 , include study . For group , inclusion criterion : 1 ) able read ; 2 ) normal cognitive function , score > 22 Mini Mental Scale Examination , cut-off point accord score instruction adapt version Spanish population . Method In April 2014 , sample select , participant randomize two group 34 . Following assessment , intervention begin May . The intervention last 6 month , participant re-assessed . The instrument use Van Dierendonck 's Spanish adaptation Ryff´s Psychological Well-being Scale , comprise 39 item internal consistency 0.78 0.81 Spanish adaptation Schwarzer Jerusalem 's General Self-Efficacy Scale ( GSE ) , internal consistency 0.84 ( Cronbach 's alpha ) . Activities conduct three 45-minute session per week . In treatment modality activity include personal independence training ( ADLs ) , sensory-motor stimulation activity , cognitive stimulation ( attention , memory , language executive function ) animal-assisted therapy ( AAT ) . The group occupational therapy participant also receive psychosocial skill train . To describe sample , investigator use descriptive statistic quantitative qualitative variable . To analyze difference main study variable apply t-student test Mann-Whitney U test , depend whether follow normal distribution . Chi square test used determine existence difference distribution gender , age educational level . To analyze main dependent variable ( self-efficacy well-being ) conduct repeated measure ANOVA intra-subject inter-subject factor . Statistical significance establish p < 0.05 . Data analyze use SPSS , version 21.0 .
